targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    checkouts.git_commit_hash AS git_commit_hash,
    checkouts.patchset_hash AS patchset_hash,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT checkouts.origin, ", " ORDER BY checkouts.origin ASC) AS origins,
    IFNULL(CAST(MIN(checkouts.start_time) AS STRING), "") AS checkouts_start_time_str,
    MAX(CASE checkouts.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS checkouts_valid_num,
    MAX(CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS builds_valid_num,
    MAX((CASE tests.status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
        (CASE tests.waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS tests_status_num
FROM
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
LEFT OUTER JOIN
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
        builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin}
LEFT OUTER JOIN
    ${dataset}.tests AS tests
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
        tests.origin LIKE ${origin}
WHERE
    checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
    checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json} AND
    checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    checkouts.origin LIKE ${origin}
GROUP BY
    checkouts.git_commit_hash,
    checkouts.patchset_hash

SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    checkouts.id,
    checkouts.origin AS origin,
    IFNULL(checkouts.git_repository_url, "") AS git_repository_url_str,
    IFNULL(checkouts.git_repository_branch, "") AS git_repository_branch_str,
    IFNULL(checkouts.git_commit_name, "") AS git_commit_name_str,
    IFNULL(CAST(checkouts.start_time AS STRING), "") AS start_time_str,
    CASE checkouts.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS valid_num,
    IFNULL(builds.valid_num, -1) AS builds_valid_num,
    IFNULL(builds.tests_status_num, -12) AS tests_status_num
FROM
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        builds.checkout_id AS checkout_id,
        MAX(CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) AS valid_num,
        MAX((CASE tests.status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE tests.waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS tests_status_num
    FROM
        ${dataset}.builds
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
        ${dataset}.tests AS tests
        ON
            tests.build_id = builds.id AND
            tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
            tests.origin LIKE ${origin}
    WHERE
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
        builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
        builds.origin LIKE ${origin}
    GROUP BY
        checkout_id
) AS builds
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id
WHERE
    checkouts.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
    checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json} AND
    checkouts.origin LIKE ${origin}
ORDER BY
    valid_num DESC,
    builds_valid_num DESC,
    tests_status_num DESC,
    checkouts.start_time DESC

SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.id,
    builds.origin,
    IFNULL(builds.architecture, "") AS architecture,
    IFNULL(REGEXP_REPLACE(builds.compiler, "^(.{48}).+$", "\\1…"), "") AS compiler,
    IFNULL(builds.config_name, "") AS config_name,
    IFNULL(CAST(builds.start_time AS STRING), "") AS start_time_str,
    IFNULL(FORMAT_TIME("%H:%M:%E3S",
                       TIME_ADD(TIME "00:00:00",
                                INTERVAL CAST((builds.duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND)),
           "") as duration_str,
    IFNULL(builds.comment, "") AS comment,
    CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS valid_num,
    tests.status_num AS tests_status_num
FROM
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json}
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        build_id,
        MAX((CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS status_num
    FROM
        ${dataset}.tests
    GROUP BY
        build_id
) AS tests
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id
WHERE
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
    IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
ORDER BY
    valid_num DESC,
    tests_status_num DESC,
    builds.start_time DESC

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    IF(builds.valid, "PASS", "FAIL") AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE ${origin}
WHERE
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    builds.valid IS NOT NULL AND
    builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
    IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
GROUP BY builds.valid
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    builds.architecture AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE ${origin}
WHERE
    builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture} AND
    IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE) AND
    NOT builds.valid
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    builds.config_name AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE ${origin}
WHERE
    builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
    builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name} AND
    NOT builds.valid
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    IF(LENGTH(builds.compiler) > 32, CONCAT(SUBSTR(builds.compiler, 1, 31), "…"), builds.compiler) AS metric,
    COUNT(builds.id) AS value
FROM
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.origin LIKE ${origin}
WHERE
    builds.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
    NOT builds.valid AND
    compiler IS NOT NULL AND
    builds.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
    IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", "Root", ${test_path:json}) AS node_title,
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", "", "⮌ Parent") AS node_parent_title,
    IF(
        STRPOS(${test_path:json}, ".") = 0,
        "",
        LEFT(${test_path:json}, CHARACTER_LENGTH(${test_path:json}) - STRPOS(REVERSE(${test_path:json}), "."))
    ) AS node_parent_path,
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", "", "⮌ Root") AS node_root_title,

    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param

/* Massage */
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    origins,
    path,
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", path, SUBSTR(path, CHARACTER_LENGTH(${test_path:json}) + 2)) AS name,
    architectures,
    tests,
    IFNULL(CAST(min_start_time AS STRING), "") AS min_start_time_str,
    IFNULL(
        FORMAT_TIME(
            "%H:%M:%E3S",
            TIME_ADD(
                TIME "00:00:00",
                INTERVAL DATETIME_DIFF(max_end_time, min_start_time, MILLISECOND) MILLISECOND
            )
        ),
        ""
    ) AS total_duration_str,
    status_num
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ", ") AS origins,
        LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1) AS path,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT architecture, ", ") AS architectures,
        MIN(start_time) AS min_start_time,
        MAX(end_time) AS max_end_time,
        COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS tests,
        MAX((CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS status_num
    FROM (
        /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
        SELECT
            tests.origin,
            tests.id,
            /* Prefix one level deeper than the displayed test's path */
            IFNULL(
                NULLIF(
                    /*
                     * Cut the test path up to and including the first dot
                     * after the currently-displayed test's path
                     */
                    LEFT(
                        tests.path,
                        INSTR(tests.path, ".", CHARACTER_LENGTH(${test_path:json}) + 2)
                    ),
                    ""
                ),
                tests.path || "."
            ) AS base_prefix,
            builds.architecture,
            tests.start_time,
            TIMESTAMP_ADD(tests.start_time, INTERVAL CAST((tests.duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND) AS end_time,
            tests.status,
            tests.waived
        FROM ${dataset}.tests
        INNER JOIN
            ${dataset}.builds AS builds
            ON
                tests.build_id = builds.id AND
                IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
                IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
        INNER JOIN
            ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
            ON
                builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
                checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
                checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json}
        WHERE
            IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
            tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
            (${test_path:json} = "" OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
    )
    GROUP BY
        base_prefix
)
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    name ASC

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    IFNULL(tests.status, "UNKNOWN") AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM ${dataset}.tests
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json}
WHERE
    IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    (${test_path:json} = "" OR tests.path = ${test_path:json} OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    tests.path AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM ${dataset}.tests
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json}
WHERE
    IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.status = "FAIL" AND
    tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    (${test_path:json} = "" OR tests.path = ${test_path:json} OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    tests.id,
    tests.origin,
    tests.path,
    tests.comment,
    builds.architecture,
    IFNULL(CAST(tests.start_time AS STRING), "") AS start_time_str,
    IFNULL(
        FORMAT_TIME("%H:%M:%E3S", TIME_ADD(TIME "00:00:00", INTERVAL CAST((tests.duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND)),
        ""
    ) AS duration_str,
    (CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
        (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6 AS status_num
FROM ${dataset}.tests
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.builds AS builds
    ON
        tests.build_id = builds.id AND
        IFNULL(builds.architecture LIKE ${build_architecture}, TRUE) AND
        IFNULL(builds.config_name LIKE ${build_config_name}, TRUE)
INNER JOIN
    ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON
        builds.checkout_id = checkouts.id AND
        checkouts.git_commit_hash = ${git_commit_hash:json} AND
        checkouts.patchset_hash = ${patchset_hash:json}
WHERE
    IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
    tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    (${test_path:json} = "" OR tests.path = ${test_path:json} OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    tests.path ASC
